sentences.sContent: The final cost could be as much as one billion dollars.
sentences.sCn: 最后的费用可能高达十亿美元。

sentences.sContent: ...a move he says could save $3 billion annually...
...Chinese consumers bought $ 9 billion worth of goods from the nation's largest shopping platform...
...Perhaps the most profound changes will come when the five billion people worldwide who currently lack Internet access get online...
...they're also realistic about the risks and dangers that lie ahead when the next five billion people come online...
...Over two billion people worldwide now have access to vastly more information than ever before...

words.tran: 十亿分之一的；第十亿的
